text: William Park (23 February 1919 – 19 July 2016) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Blackpool and York City, and in non-League football for Felling Red Star and Scarborough. ==References== ;Specific ;General *Gerry Wolstenholme's obituary for Billy Park, 1 August 2016 Category:1919 births Category:Sportspeople from Gateshead Category:2016 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: William Park (footballer)
